com.viaoa.jfc

Class OADateChooser

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.viaoa.jfc.OADateChooser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAJfcComponent, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OAPopupDateChooser

    public class OADateChooser
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements OAJfcComponent
    Popup calendar component. You can set the preferredSize directly or by changing the font, which will change the preferredSize automatically. This component will automatically size the font to take up all avail space. It uses Font.BOLD as a style.

    Example:
    Create a popup calendar that is bound to the hire date for a Hub of Employee objects. 

            OADateChooser dc = new OADateChooser(HubEmployee, "hireDate");

    For more information about this package, see documentation.

    See Also:
    OADateComboBox, Serialized Form
